 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַף‎</span> **noun masculine** ==basin, goblet== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַף‎</span>; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סף‎</span> (Inscription of Tyre<sup>(1), 5, 6</sup>) [[BDB#Schröd|Schröd]]<sup>ZMG xxxix (1886), 317 f.</sup> [[BDB#ClGann|ClGann]]<sup>Annales du Musée Guimet x. 511 = Recuell d'arch. orient.(1886), 89</sup> [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>RŠJ xii.107</sup> [[BDB#Bloch|Bloch]]; but [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>330</sup> ***door-sill)***; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> absolute***basin*** [[Exod.12.22|Exod 12:22]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]; containing blood of passover lamb); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַףרַֿעַל‎</span> [[Zech.12.2|Zech 12:2]] ***goblet of reeling*** (intoxicating, figurative), probably also [[Hab.2.15|Hab 2:15]], where read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסַּף חֲמָֽתְךָ‎</span> ***from the goblet of thy fury*** (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְסַפֵּחַ ח‎</span>, see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספח‎</span>); plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַפּוֺת‎</span> [[2Sam.17.28|2Sam 17:28]] ***basins*** for ordinary use; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסִּפִּים‎</span> [[Jer.52.19|Jer 52:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסִפּוֺת‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.50|1Kgs 7:50]] and construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִפּוֺת כֶּסֶף‎</span> [[2Kgs.12.14|2Kgs 12:14]], of temple utensils. 

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַף‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]]</sup> ==threshold, sill== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician see [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>1</sup>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַף‎</span>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סִפָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Arabic ***sippu*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>509, all</sup> ***id.***); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[2Kgs.12.10|2Kgs 12:10]] +, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסָּ֑ף‎</span> [[Judg.19.27|Judg 19:27]] + 3 t. ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסָּ֑ף‎</span> [[2Kgs.25.8|2Kgs 25:8]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִפִּי‎</span> [[Ezek.43.8|Ezek 43:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִפָּם‎</span> v[[Ezek.43.8|Ezek 43:8]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִפִּים‎</span> [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]]; [[Isa.6.4|Isa 6:4]] + 6 t. Ezra, Chronicles; — ***threshold, sill*** [[Judg.19.27|Judg 19:27]]; [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]]; [[Isa.6.4|Isa 6:4]]; [[Ezek.41.16|Ezek 41:16]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.43.8|Ezek 43:8]] (twice in verse); [[2Chr.3.7|2Chr 3:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבַּיִת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[1Kgs.14.17|1Kgs 14:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשַּׁעַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Ezek.40.6|Ezek 40:6]]; [[Ezek.40.7|Ezek 40:7]], compare v[[Ezek.40.6|Ezek 40:6]] b <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁמֵרֹ הַסַּף‎</span> = ***door-keeper***, an important temple official, [[Jer.35.4|Jer 35:4]], so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁמְרֵי הַסּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.12.10|2Kgs 12:10]] (priests), [[2Kgs.22.4|2Kgs 22:4]] = [[2Chr.34.9|2Chr 34:9]] (Levites!), [[2Kgs.23.4|2Kgs 23:4]]; [[2Kgs.25.18|2Kgs 25:18]] = [[Jer.52.24|Jer 52:24]] in Persia, of palace [[Esth.2.21|Esth 2:21]]; [[Esth.6.2|Esth 6:2]] of tabernacle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסִּפִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[1Chr.9.19|1Chr 9:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁעֲרֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסּ‎</span> [[2Chr.23.4|2Chr 23:4]] (Levites), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁעֲרִים בַּסּ‎</span> [[1Chr.9.22|1Chr 9:22]] collective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹרֶב בַּסָּ֑ף‎</span> [[Zeph.2.14|Zeph 2:14]] ***desolation in the thresholds***.
